mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, password, email, name, gender, phone, address, detail_address, birthday, total_amount, role, cancel, profile, createDate) VALUES(#{username},#{password},#{email}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{birthday}, #{total_amount}, #{role}, #{cancel}, #{profile}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, name, gender, phone, address, detail_address, birthday, total_amount, role, cancel, profile, createDate FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY id
